section.p: The "select subject areas" window is shown when the "Change preselected subject areas" button in the MT Job dialog window is pressed. It allows the preselection of subject areas:
On the left hand side the available subject areas are displayed. The right hand side displays the list of selected subject areas.

To add subject areas to the selected subject area list check one or more subject areas and press the ">" button. The checked subject areas will be added to the list of selected subject areas. Use the '+'-sign in front of subject areas to open hidden branches. Use the '-' sign to hide opened branches.
To removed subject areas from the selected subject area list select one or more subject areas and press the '<' button. The selected subject areas will be removed from the list.
If you are done presse the "OK" button to return to the MT Job dialog.
